tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ****** ******* *** ** * **** **** ****** *** treats the disease very well with minimal medicines and he understands the patients issues & concerns thoroughly and addresses them in a very gentle manner. He ensures to explain the patients about the medicines prescribed which gives good confidence to the patients and frees them from worrying about any side effects. Very polite & friendly Doctor Mahesh Pai is. A bunch of Thanks to him for all the good treatment & great service he is providing at Sparsh Hospital!!!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We are consulting with Mahesh SIR from more than 8 years for my family members (Appa, Amma, Akka, My wife and me). ** *** ****** ** ****** **** ******. We are seeing from Sumathi Nusing home, Matthikere.

His treatment is so genuine, so simple, so specific to the illness you got. He will make your easier always by clearing all your doubts. While he is checking he always has time to touch and feel your pulse, heart rate and hear lungs. 

In simple one word I can  Confidently and proudly say Mahesh SIR is so honest, simple and genuine in Medical Industry **** *** ******* ***** **** **** ** ****** *********

**** ********* ** **** **** ********* **** ******

I'm heartly  recommend the Sparsh hospital.....‚ú®

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Most pleasant person, always reassuring about recovery. Efficient medical treatment. In my case I use to look forward to the doctor's visit and Dr. Mahesh Chandra pai has really being my living god enabling me to come out of the critical situation to a normal life.In future also any type of even a slight health concern I shall be consulting Dr Mahesh only.
************************

tags: None
review:
Amazing Doctor!

Went to meet doctor with previous reports and latest blood report, doctor looked into all reports and patiently listen to all the concerns and answered all the queries.

Didn't advised any medical prescription as there wasn't need.

~50% patients/illness gets cured by the way how doctors communicates with patients, Dr Mahesh is one such doctor.

Thanks üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Mahesh is a friendly doctor who explains the diagnosis and the outcomes in simple terms to the patients and always open to listen to our queries. He has a good process in place due to which patients have few mandatory Pre checks already completed with the support team before we meet the doctor this helps save time and make the consultation effective. Overall a great human being who has a Midas touch!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Outpatient treatment,Preventive care of Heart& Lung diseases,
review: I'm very happy with the hospital and the doctors who treated our family for the present pandemic that is covid 19. We are very thankful for Dr. Mahesh Pai for bringing us back to normal who were suffering from corona. I also thank Dr. John Paul and Dr. Rohan also for visiting us in the ward along with Dr. Mahesh Pai. I swear I'm very very happy with the hospital. They have given us a  new life. We are very grateful to them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: His approach is very human. He is very humble. He listens to patient very patiently. He explains reason for his treatment and prescription. Answers all queries/doubts of patient. Guides to patient's satisfaction. On the whole at the end, patient gets confident in his treatments. Definitely, I will recommend his name to my acquaintances.
